_comment: Yield profiles: griller → primary parts at Putten. All yield_percentage values are 0.0-1.0 (fraction of griller weight). Total saleable yield: 73.5% — remaining 26.5% is primary cutting loss (bone dust, trim, moisture, cat3).

profiles.yield_note: Phase 2 plan estimate. Bone-in breast cap incl. skin. JA757 breast_fillet is 23.2% of live weight = 32.8% of griller, but borstkap is the whole bone-in cut before deboning — lower saleable yield due to trim.
Phase 2 plan estimate. Whole leg quarter (thigh+drumstick) bone-in. JA757 leg_quarter is 28.2% of live weight = 39.9% of griller — this lower figure accounts for trim at primary cutting.
JA757: wing = 7.6% of live weight ÷ 70.7% griller yield = 10.75% of griller. Rounded to 10.7%. Consistent with existing availability.ts.
Phase 2 plan estimate. Back/carcass frame after removing breast and leg quarters. JA757 back = 11.7% of live weight = 16.5% of griller — saleable rug is lower due to bone/cartilage removal.
Estimated from total orgaan yield 3.8% split. Liver is the largest organ component.
Estimated from total orgaan yield 3.8% split. Gizzard.
Estimated from total orgaan yield 3.8% split. Heart is smallest organ.
Estimated from total orgaan yield 3.8% split. Neck.
